## TryCpConductor.connectAppInterface() method

Connect a web socket to the App API.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
connectAppInterface(port: number): Promise<null>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  port | number | The port to attach the app interface to. |
